title: Isla Negra
content:
Hello typophiles, this is my new attempt to pixel text typeface, please critique   
   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414141953im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/23979.gif)
author: luciano_vergara

comments.content:
Sorry about the bad ortography, please critique   
regards   
   
lv   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414141953im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/23996.gif)

Very Nice italic, I like it very much, specially the joined script one.   
   
I think that the ascenders and descenders can be a pixel longer, this can be a matter of taste but I think that at least the " l " and the " t " do need it. Also think that the spacing can be a pixel tigther.   
   
I edited the central column of the poem (it has a mark) to show how the color is enhaced by these modifications.   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414141953im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/24003.gif)

this is my new attempt   
regards lv.   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414141953im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/24078.gif)

I think your font more beautiful than me   
and I will be to try other style soon or later   
thank you for your post and I really lean more ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414141953im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
there are my pixel font work
